vedabase.translation: Material activities never entangle the devotees of the Supreme Lord, who are fully satisfied by serving the dust of His lotus feet. Nor do material activities entangle those intelligent sages who have freed themselves from the bondage of all fruitive reactions by the power of yoga. So how could there be any question of bondage for the Lord Himself, who assumes His transcendental forms according to His own sweet will?

terms.किमुताखिलसत्त्वानां: किम् (कः) उत (वा) अखिल (सभी) सत्त्वानां (प्राणियों का) - What is the nature of all living beings?
terms.तिर्यङ्‌मर्त्यदिवौकसाम्: तिर्यङ् (पशु) मर्त्य (मनुष्य) दिवौकसाम् (देवता) - Whether they are animals, humans or gods?
terms.ईशितुश्चेशितव्यानां: ईशितु: (संप्राप्त होने वालों का सर्वेश्वर) चेशितव्यानां (कार्यों को करने वालों) - What is the relationship between the controller and the doers?
terms.कुशलाकुशलान्वयः: कुशल (योग्य) अकुशलान् (अयोग्य) अन्वय: (संबंध) - How do their respective skills and abilities impact each other?

bard.meaning: That lotus feet pollen serving satisfied yoga power freed all actions bondage automatically move sages even not bathe his will assumed body from where indeed bondage
